verses.text: \w A|strong="H3427"\w* psalm \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3427"\w* canticle \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* sabbath day.

\w It|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good \w to|strong="H0559"\w* give praise \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* sing \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w name|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* most High.
\w To|strong="H3588"\w* shew forth thy mercy \w in|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H1698"\w* thy truth \w in|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* night:

Upon \w an|strong="H8478"\w* instrument \w of|strong="H8478"\w* ten strings, upon \w the|strong="H8478"\w* psaltery: \w with|strong="H0571"\w* \w a|strong="H8478"\w* canticle upon \w the|strong="H8478"\w* harp.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* thou hast given \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, O Lord, \w a|strong="H3808"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3808"\w* thy doings: \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* works \w of|strong="H6343"\w* thy hands \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* rejoice.
O Lord, how great are thy works! thy thoughts are exceeding deep.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* senseless man \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* know: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* fool understand these \w things|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w spring|strong="H5869"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H7200"\w* grass: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* all \w the|strong="H7200"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* iniquity \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w*: \w That|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H5869"\w* perish \w for|strong="H5869"\w* ever \w and|strong="H5869"\w* ever:
\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, art most high \w for|strong="H3588"\w* evermore.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* thy enemies, O Lord, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* thy enemies \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* perish: \w and|strong="H0168"\w* all \w the|strong="H0413"\w* workers \w of|strong="H0168"\w* iniquity \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* scattered.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* horn \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* exalted \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* unicorn: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* old age \w in|strong="H1870"\w* plentiful mercy.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* eye also hath \w looked|strong="H5375"\w* \w down|strong="H5062"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemies: \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* ear \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* hear \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* downfall \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* malignant \w that|strong="H6435"\w* \w rise|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* just shall flourish \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* palm tree: \w he|strong="H5921"\w* shall grow \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cedar \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Libanus.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* planted \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* house \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* flourish \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* courts \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* house \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* God.
\w They|strong="H7121"\w* shall still increase \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* fruitful old age: \w and|strong="H7121"\w* shall be \w well|strong="H5973"\w* treated,

\w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* shew, \w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H7200"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* righteous, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* there \w is|strong="H3117"\w* no iniquity \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.
